boardgame.name: Advanced Squad Leader: Starter Kit Expansion Pack #1
ASL Starter Kit Expansion Pack #1
boardgame.description: (from MMP website and user's description:)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MMP presents the 4th installment of it successful Advanced Squad Leader Starter Kit line, The Advanced Squad Leader Starter Kit Expansion Pack #1. The Expansion Pack has been designed with all levels of Starter Kit players in mind and includes something for everyone._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Expansion Pack includes three new boards; q, r, and s consisting of a small city board, a village/woods board, and a rural woods/hill board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In addition, the Pack comes with 8 new scenarios set in locations such as Poland 1939, Finland 1942, Sicily 1943, France 1944, and Germany 1944. The Expansion Pack includes actions pitting the Poles against the Slovakian army, Russians advancing against Germans, Americans in their struggle against the Italians, and the Free French forces defending against a sudden German counterattack._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Expansion Pack is completely standalone providing everything you need to play the game (except dice) including new counters and updated rules and charts addressing known errata!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This product is a must have for Advanced Squad Leader Starter Kit enthusiasts everywhere._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Expansion Pack covers actions that allow any level of Starter Kit player from Starter Kit 1 to Starter Kit 3 with 2 Infantry only (Starter Kit 1) scenarios, 2 Infantry and Guns (Starter Kit 2) scenarios, and 4 scenarios with Tanks (Starter Kit 3) of which 2 have tanks on one side only._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fight your way across the tactical battlefields of World War 2 using the men and equipment available historically. Only this time you can determine the outcome!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;ASL Starter Kit Expansion Pack #1 contains:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 3 8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;x22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; geomorphic mapboards (q,r,s)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 sheet of 1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 sheet of 5/8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fully illustrated (in color) rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New charts (QRDC, etc.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 8 new scenarios_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scenario list:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S44 Across the border (Poland 1939 - Slovakian vs Polish)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S45 Contected settlement (Poland 1939 - Slovakian vs Polish)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S46 Where the winter lingers (Finland 1942 - German vs Russian)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S47 Not so dispersed (Sicily 1943 - Italians vs Americans)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S48 Converging assaults (Sicily 1943 - Italians vs Americans)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S49 Cooks, clerks and bazookas (France 1944 - Americans vs Germans)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S50 N-463 (France 1944 - French vs Germans)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; S51 Enter the young (Germany 1944 - Americans vs Germans)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Note: this Expansion Pack comes in a ziplock without a box or dice.
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2011 Charles S. Roberts Best Expansion or Supplement for an Existing Game Nominee
2011 Charles S. Roberts Best Expansion or Supplement for an Existing Game Winner

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: For sale here is one brand new, factory sealed ASL Starter kit Expansion Pack. Great new ASL pack. Buy it here for the discounted price of $34.95. Shipping USA $4.95 Canada $7.95 Everywhere Else $14.95. In stock and ready to ship. Paypal or US money order.

For sale here is one brand new, factory sealed ASL Starter kit Expansion Pack. Great new ASL pack. Buy it here for the discounted price of $29.95. Shipping USA $4.95 Canada $7.95 Everywhere Else $14.95. In stock and ready to ship. Paypal or US money order.

For sale here is one brand new, factory sealed ASL Starter kit Expansion Pack. Great new ASL pack. Buy it here for the discounted price of $29.95. Shipping USA $4.95 Canada $7.95 Everywhere Else $14.95. In stock and ready to ship. Paypal or US money order.
English version.
English version.
Mint, in shrink
Shipping cost in France and Europe: 8€ Shipping cost - rest of the world: 12€
English version.

In shrink. I have ASLSK#1 with counters clipped, rules highlighted and some notes made in pencil. I have ASLSK#2 with counters clipped and untouched rules. I also have the excellent tutorial in a notebook (but it would raise shipping cost). I only want to sell these as a group for $100.

Brand New Shrink Wrapped copy of Advanced Squad Leader: Starter Kit Expansion Pack #1 Note: Assuming the buyer is willing I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to complete all paperwork required by the BGG Market Place on the day of purchase and have the item packed and shipped on the next working day. Postage within the UK will normally be by Royal Mail First Class with a charge of £4.30 for this item. If you want to make multiple purchases contact me and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll consolidate postage. I will ship items to Europe, price for Airmail will be £7.82 Thanks for looking.
Private sale for BGG User _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Domhnall101_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Step Loss Auction. Zip Lock copy of game, Like New, UP. Thank you.
Mint, in shrink.

New game that I won still in shrink. The shipping price will vary from a location to another. Send me your address and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll give you the exact price. I will use Canada Post and according to BGG packaging stats, the shipping fee should be around: US 9$ Canada 9$-13$ I really want to get rid of this game so I am willing to negotiate anything including trading for other games or changing the price. I am located in Montreal, so I could make an exchange in person there.
Brand New! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard shipping to a continental US street address: $7.95
IN FACTORY SHRINK. This is playable without owning any other Starter Kit Product!
Out of shrink; mint condition/unpunched
Brand New! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard shipping to a continental US street address: $7.95

The cellophane bag that ASL Ex Pack #1 ships in has been carefully cut open at the top to examine the contents, but the game itself remains unpunched, mint, almost completely un-handled even, and in perfect condition. So I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know if I should list it as New or Like New. Close enough to New I thought. Shipped promptly (post office next door to my office) and packed with great care. In addition to PayPal I also accept credit card payments Square (see Square.com, I can simply key in your credit card with less fees for me).
Unpunched
Open but unpunched.

Never opened still in the plastic wrapper. Be the one to rip this one open. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship with multiple purchases.
Punched, counters sorted in gripseal bags.

Unpunched. Wrapper opened to take a peek and then put away. Cpntents in like new condition. You might as well dive deeper into the murky world of ASL. Will/Can be mailed in a priority envelope. Worldwide shipping. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship with multiple purchases.
Mint in shrink.
New in that crinkly shrink wrap that MMP uses ...
Like new and unpunched. Will split USPS Priority shipping with buyer.
WILLING TO NEGOTIATE Opened to check contents which are all in excellent condition (counters are perfectly die-cut).

Purchased new, opened, but never played. Counters still on sprue, no damage to the rules, game boards, etc. Kept in a smoke-free home, stored on a shelf. Please note this is a complete game, but it was never packaged in a box, came in a cling wrap, magazine style. I can take pictures to validate ownership and condition upon request. Buyer to pay actual shipping.
Mint, shrink copy sitting on the shelf. Original owner.
New in original packaging. Shipped via UPS for free.
Unpunched, in ziplock. Shipping: CH 8 EUR, DE 10 EUR, UK 10 EUR, US 14 EUR. Ask me for other destinations. Shipping costs verifiable at post.ch.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling the following items ADVANCED SQUAD LEADER STARTER KIT EXPANSION PACK #1 - Brand New, shrinkrapped Feel free to ask for further information. I can send pictures if requested. Shipping costs depending on buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s location. Shipping to Europe should be about 20 euros. Overseas shipping can cost a lot: please ask before buying. If buyer lives inItaly, I can accept bank wire transfers and Postepay cash deposit too.
New in shrink!
Punched
New in original packaging. Will ship worldwide.
RESERVED for JASONKRUSE See the photos. Unused. All components are accounted for. Shipping in USA is $7 International is at cost

*** SPARE COUNTERS ONLY - NO OTHER COMPONENTS ARE INCLUDED *** The counters are punched, trimmed and in plastic baggies. The following counters are missing/not included (Please refer to the countersheet images on BGG for reference): 1x US 6-6-7 (D) MMC 1x US 6-6-6 (F) MMC 1x US 8-1 (Sgt Cole) SMC 1x US MMG (B) 1x German LMG (C) 1x German 8-1 (Sgt Gehrig) SMC 1x _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;PIN_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; marker 1x _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;DM_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; marker Photos available on request. Will ship worldwide, please contact for costs. Please feel free to make me an offer; really not sure how to price these. If you have any questions please ask, and thanks for looking!
Brand new in shrink.
Brand new in shrink.
New in shrink

New and unpunched-complete Shipping France, Belgium, Luxemburg : 6 Euros (mondial relay) Spain, Italy, UK, Germany, Austria, Portugal : 11 Euros other EU countries: 14€ other european countries: 14€ Rest of the world : 18€
Shrink wrapping removed, otherwise in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;as new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition. Shipping is from Lithgow NSW 2790, Australia.

Standalone ASLSK game with a nice mix of forces, German, Italian, Axis minor, American, British, Allied Minor and Russian units. Game unused and in excellent condition, counters are punched but unfortunately one Axis minor 8-0 leader is MIA, luckily the set came with two! Weight is 600g, see below for shipping cost.

Game is in excellent condition. Shrinkwrap opened. Shipping in an enveloppe: France:6€ Europe: 14€ Rest of the world: 18€ Shipping as a tracked and insured parcel: France/Belgium/Luxembourg : 6€ Spain/Germany/UK, Portugal, Italy, Austria:11€ other EU countries and Switzerland: 15€ other european countries : 20€ rest of the world : 27€
See the photos. Unused / Unpunched. All components are accounted for. Shipping in USA is $7 International is at cost
New in ziploc bag.

*** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,700 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $8 shipping to US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover/AMEX. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason PS: We have many Osprey books in stock not listed on BGG. The prices are well under publisher rates; if you are interested in them, please let me know!

Shipping costs / Versandkosten: Germany: 5,00 € (egal, wie viele Artikel ihr bei uns kauft) EU Countries: 10,00 € (regardless how much articles You order from us) Rest of the World: We send You a mail with the shipping costs All games are new and in their original wrapping and all prices include the German VAT (7% or 19%). If You live outside the EU You don´t have to pay the German VAT (we send You the new, lower price with the confirmation). We offer only goods that we have in stock, You can also visit our onlineshop www.gamers-hq.de for more games Payment may be made by Paypal (no extra fee) or bank transfer in advance. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). If You´re a German buyer, just read the text below (“…innerhalb Deutschlands gilt:..”) You find our term _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; conditions here: https://gamers-hq.de/en/terms-conditions Innerhalb Deutschlands gilt: Alle Spiele sind Neuware und in Orginalverpackung . Alle Preise sind inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer von 7% bzw. 19%. Bezahlt werden kann per paypal, Vorauskasse, Bankeinzug oder direkt bei uns im Laden (wenn ihr aus Berlin kommt). Wenn ihr noch irgendwelche Fragen habt, ruft uns an (030 79706126), schickt uns ne Mail (laden@gamers-hq.de) oder besucht unsere Homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). Unsere AGB findet ihr hier : https://gamers-hq.de/agb

THERE IS NO BOX that comes with this game. Also comes with 2 GMT trays. I will ship, protected, in a USPS Priority box. Shipping is $9.00 From a nonsmoking, petfree home. Excellent condition. All sales must be paid for in 3 days.
